title: Introduction
body: I am based in the Philippines with knack of programming and analytics. I was born on December 06, 2001. If I were to describe myself in one word, it would be 'inquisitive'. I am a very curious person. I love new discovery and learning the unknown.

title: Education
body: Bachelor of Engineering Technology in Computer Engineering Technology at TUP

title: Interests
body: I enjoy solving real-world problems with data, exploring new technologies, and working in personal projects.

title: Personal Philosophy
body: I believe in continous learning but also in taking breaks -- spending time with my cats, playing games, or exploring new things.
